product_name: Aquaglide Columbia XP Tandem XL Inflatable Kayak
long_description: Loaded with convenient features and great paddling performance, this smooth-gliding inflatable tandem kayak is perfect for all-around recreational paddling on lakes, ponds and slow, deep rivers.
short_description: Loaded with convenient features and great paddling performance, this smooth-gliding inflatable tandem kayak is perfect for all-around recreational paddling on lakes, ponds and slow, deep rivers.
